reviewText: Curious George is always a hit at our house. This video compilation (Curious George Makes New Friends) is no exception. My three year old loves to watch his "monkey george" at least once a day. One episode, however, seems to frighten him. The episode where Huntley the dog gets caught and put into a dog pound scares him for some reason (maybe he identifies with Huntley a bit too much). Other than that, you can't beat this educational entertainment for the price.
Title: N/A

reviewText: My kids watch all the Curious George videos over & over. You can't go wrong on any of them...I own about 10. It's nice to have lots of short episodes (8 on each DVD) so you can play all for a long car ride or just show one before bedtime. The videos are educational and teach basic concepts; not as educational as Super Y or some of PBS shows, but much better than regular cartoons or movies. Also, even 2 year olds love the bright colors and Curious George monkey antics.
Title: N/A

reviewText: If your child loves Curious George (as our 4 year old daughter does) then you won't be disappointed by this video.  It is typical Curious George... fun, laughter, and learning.

reviewText: This is not the first George DVD I've bought where the casing came already broken. My husband told me to send it back, but considering that we've bought others and they are all the same cheap casing that breaks and then the DVD just tosses around in there, and also considering that I spent under five dollars on this purchase, I didn't want to waste my time or the resources to send it back. However, I think the company that is making the cases for the George DVDs should know that they are shoddy and that it makes the customer feel a bit slighted.Anyway, another great collection of Curious George segments. Love it.

reviewText: We watch Curious George on tv every morning.  On road trips she would ask to watch him,but we didn't have any videos of him.  When I found the Curious George videos on Amazon, it was like striking gold.  These videos contain multiple episodes totally 90 minutes of enjoyment.  She loves them and it occupies her.
summary: Great video.  My daughter loves Curious George.
